title: Project Leg break
notes: Heavy lower body session working to a 3-RM scquat. Targe = 265 lbs. Bing real development with stable core finisher.

warmup.description: Ren dynamic and mobility prep (run + legs)
items: Dynamic leg swings, Human squats, Deep lunges

blocks.name: Heavy Squat Triple
blocks.instructions: Work up to a 3-RM at 265 lbs. Focus on depth and core.

exercises.name: Backsquat
exercises.notes: Load: 45, 45, 25, then 10. Brace core, drive neitral path.

blocks.name: Core Finisher
blocks.instructions: 3 rounds, focus on control and stability.

exercises.name: Ab Roller
exercises.notes: Keep core tight, don't overextend span.
